text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode where concept is-a _CitizenRoleType

name: CitizenRoleType
title: CitizenRoleType
description:
A role type used to qualify a person's legal status within a country or nation.

**Examples:**

 *  Full citizen
 *  Asylum seeker
 *  Permit card holder
